tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Vulnerabilities (
	vulnerability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	vulnerability_name VARCHAR(255),
	patch_id INT,
	patch_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  severity VARCHAR(20),
  affected_systems JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE patches (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vulnerability_id UUID REFERENCES vulnerabilities(id),
  patch_version VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  patch_date DATE,
  patched_systems JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  severity VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE patches (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vulnerability_id INT,
  patch_version VARCHAR(20),
  patch_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE systems (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_name VARCHAR(100),
  is_up_to_date BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
severity VARCHAR(10),
description TEXT,
patch_id INT REFERENCES patches(id));

CREATE TABLE patches (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
version VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
date_published DATE,
date_applied DATE);

CREATE TABLE systems (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
version VARCHAR(20),
last_checked DATE);
